betterquesting:10.desc:8:
Demon injection, while a quest alongside occultism, requires a mage gauntlet of occultism for support. 
 Ancestral device required for magic injection is the Altar of Magic Injection. 
 It requires eight Arcane Stones, an Arcane Base, a Rune Matrix, and a handful of World Salt. The building plans can be found in the "Bookmarks" section on the right side of the page in the chapter on Arcane Magic. \Once constructed, you need to sprinkle a handful of World Salt on top of it, and then right-click on the Rune Matrix with the Mage's Hand to complete the construction of the Magic Altar! 
The magic altar needs to be placed around the base, it is recommended to make 2 pairs of symmetrically placed magic base, note that it must be placed symmetrically, otherwise it will reduce the stability of the magic altar.
